en.register_welcome: 👋 Hello #username#, welcome to AquaHabits! Your daily hydration goal is set to 2000 ml to help you stay fresh and focused 💧.
en.login_welcome: 👋 Welcome back, #username#! Use /help to see what you can do 📘.
en.help:
/start – Set up your AquaHabits profile and begin 🟢
/setgoal – Choose your daily water goal (ml) 🎯
/drink – Add how much water you drank 💧
/progress – Check today’s progress toward your goal 📊
/clear – Remove all hydration records if needed 🧹
/help – View this help menu again 📘
en.set_goal_prompt: 🎯 What’s your new daily goal? (in ml):
en.drink_prompt: 💧 How much water did you drink? (in ml):
en.clear_prompt: 🧼 All hydration records have been cleared successfully.
en.goal_success: ✅ Daily goal updated to #new_goal# ml. Stay consistent!
en.goal_fail: ❌ That doesn’t seem right. Try something like 2500.
en.drink_fail: ⚠️ Please enter a valid number, like 300.
en.chat_fail: 🤔 I didn’t understand that. Use /help to see the available commands.
en.daily_progress_empty: 📭 No records yet today. Use /drink to log your first cup 💧.
en.daily_goal_reached: 🎉 Well done! You’ve reached your hydration goal for today 💪.
